title: Sidewall, 1920–50
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Repeating motif of a landscape vignette. The scene contains a young man and woman with a dog. The woman, seated, holds a basket. Behind is a tree. This scene alternates with a basket motif containing a bird with outstretched wing and fruit. These motifs repeat in two vertical columns separated by foliate guilloche bands. The background is filled with a repeating stylized floral motif, printed in rows. Printed in two shades of red on an off-white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1920–50.
1920–50. Block-printed. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-85.
